name: Fun Outside Aviation Academy
about: Fun Outside Aviation Academy, located at Fullerton Airport in California, is a top-rated flight school dedicated to providing a comprehensive and enjoyable flight training experience. Our academy offers a range of certifications, including Private Pilot, Night Rating, Commercial Pilot, Instrument Rating, and Multi Engine Ratings. With a fleet of well-maintained aircraft and flexible scheduling, we cater to students of all levels and schedules. Our instructors are highly experienced and committed to ensuring a safe, educational, and fun learning environment. Owned by Garrett and Shannon, the academy is known for its generous flexibility and top-notch training, making it an ideal choice for those pursuing a career in aviation or flying for pleasure. We strive to make every flight a memorable and educational experience.
services:
["Ground School
Intro Flight
